directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute onion and garlic until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Add jackfruit; saute until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes. Add salsa and taco seasoning; cook and stir until flavors combine, about 2 minutes more.
ingredients: 2 (20 ounce) cans green jackfruit in brine, drained and shredded (such as Trader Joe's®)
1 (1 ounce) packet dry taco seasoning mix
title: Elle's Vegan Jackfruit Taco Filling
